title: Old signs with cool numerals
content: There are close-ones aplenty, but I cant find anything with such a tight 2. ideas anyone? ![signs](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020081258im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/2833.jpg)
author: pogono

comments.content: Ser ju ut som Din Schriften möter Compacta, fast med en bauta serif på tvåan...
